atlassian.description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Atlassian products (Confluence and Jira). This integration supports both Confluence & Jira Cloud and Server/Data Center deployments.

env_vars.description: Confluence URL (e.g., https://your-domain.atlassian.net/wiki)
env_vars.name: CONFLUENCE_URL

env_vars.description: Confluence username/email for Cloud deployments
env_vars.name: CONFLUENCE_USERNAME

env_vars.description: Confluence API token for Cloud deployments
env_vars.name: CONFLUENCE_API_TOKEN

env_vars.description: Confluence Personal Access Token for Server/Data Center deployments
env_vars.name: CONFLUENCE_PERSONAL_TOKEN

env_vars.description: Verify SSL certificates for Confluence Server/Data Center (true/false)
env_vars.name: CONFLUENCE_SSL_VERIFY

env_vars.description: Comma-separated list of Confluence space keys to filter search results
env_vars.name: CONFLUENCE_SPACES_FILTER

env_vars.description: Jira URL (e.g., https://your-domain.atlassian.net)
env_vars.name: JIRA_URL

env_vars.description: Jira username/email for Cloud deployments
env_vars.name: JIRA_USERNAME

env_vars.description: Jira API token for Cloud deployments
env_vars.name: JIRA_API_TOKEN

env_vars.description: Jira Personal Access Token for Server/Data Center deployments
env_vars.name: JIRA_PERSONAL_TOKEN

env_vars.description: Verify SSL certificates for Jira Server/Data Center (true/false)
env_vars.name: JIRA_SSL_VERIFY

env_vars.description: Comma-separated list of Jira project keys to filter search results
env_vars.name: JIRA_PROJECTS_FILTER

env_vars.description: Run in read-only mode (disables all write operations)
env_vars.name: READ_ONLY_MODE

env_vars.description: Increase logging verbosity
env_vars.name: MCP_VERBOSE

fetch.description: A Model Context Protocol server that provides web content fetching capabilities

filesystem.description: Node.js server implementing Model Context Protocol (MCP) for filesystem operations.

firecrawl.description: A powerful web scraping and content extraction MCP server that provides advanced crawling, search, and structured data extraction capabilities with LLM integration.

env_vars.description: API key for FireCrawl service authentication
env_vars.name: FIRECRAWL_API_KEY

env_vars.description: FireCrawl API URL (default: https://api.firecrawl.dev/v1)
env_vars.name: FIRECRAWL_API_URL

env_vars.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for API calls
env_vars.name: FIRECRAWL_RETRY_MAX_ATTEMPTS

env_vars.description: Initial delay in milliseconds for retry backoff
env_vars.name: FIRECRAWL_RETRY_INITIAL_DELAY

env_vars.description: Maximum delay in milliseconds for retry backoff
env_vars.name: FIRECRAWL_RETRY_MAX_DELAY

env_vars.description: Backoff factor for retry delay calculation
env_vars.name: FIRECRAWL_RETRY_BACKOFF_FACTOR

env_vars.description: Credit threshold for warning notifications
env_vars.name: FIRECRAWL_CREDIT_WARNING_THRESHOLD

env_vars.description: Credit threshold for critical notifications
env_vars.name: FIRECRAWL_CREDIT_CRITICAL_THRESHOLD

git.description: A Model Context Protocol server for Git repository interaction and automation

github.description: The GitHub MCP Server provides seamless integration with GitHub APIs, enabling advanced automation and interaction capabilities for developers and tools

env_vars.description: GitHub personal access token with appropriate permissions
env_vars.name: GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN

env_vars.description: GitHub Enterprise Server hostname (optional)
env_vars.name: GH_HOST

grafana.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Grafana that provides access to your Grafana instance and the surrounding ecosystem, enabling dashboard search, datasource queries, alerting management, incident response, and Sift investigations.

env_vars.description: URL of the Grafana instance to connect to
env_vars.name: GRAFANA_URL

env_vars.description: Service account token with appropriate permissions
env_vars.name: GRAFANA_API_KEY

hass-mcp.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Home Assistant integration with Claude and other LLMs, enabling direct interaction with smart home devices, sensors, and automations.

env_vars.description: Home Assistant instance URL (e.g. http://homeassistant.local:8123)
env_vars.name: HA_URL

env_vars.description: Home Assistant Long-Lived Access Token
env_vars.name: HA_TOKEN

k8s.description: MKP is a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Kubernetes that allows LLM-powered applications to interact with Kubernetes clusters.

env_vars.description: Path to the kubeconfig file for Kubernetes API authentication (mounted into the container with --volume)
env_vars.name: KUBECONFIG

memory.description: A basic implementation of persistent memory using a local knowledge graph. This lets Claude remember information about the user across chats.

env_vars.description: Path to the memory storage JSON file (default: memory.json in the server directory)
env_vars.name: MEMORY_FILE_PATH

netbird.description: A Model Context Protocol server for NetBird, enabling management of your NetBird network.

env_vars.description: NetBird API token for authentication
env_vars.name: NETBIRD_API_TOKEN

env_vars.description: NetBird API host (default is api.netbird.io)
env_vars.name: NETBIRD_HOST

oci-registry.description: The OCI Registry MCP Server enables secure and seamless querying of OCI container registries, providing tools for image introspection, tag discovery, and manifest/config retrieval.

env_vars.description: Bearer token for OCI registry authentication
env_vars.name: OCI_TOKEN

env_vars.description: Username for registry authentication
env_vars.name: OCI_USERNAME

env_vars.description: Password for registry authentication
env_vars.name: OCI_PASSWORD

osv.description: An MCP (Model Context Protocol) server that provides access to the OSV (Open Source Vulnerabilities) database. This server allows LLM-powered applications to query the OSV database for vulnerability information about packages and commits.

semgrep.description: An MCP server for using Semgrep to scan code for security vulnerabilities. Semgrep is a fast, deterministic static analysis tool that semantically understands many languages and comes with over 5,000 rules.

env_vars.description: Token for connecting to Semgrep AppSec Platform
env_vars.name: SEMGREP_APP_TOKEN

sequentialthinking.description: MCP server enabling dynamic problem-solving with a structured, reflective approach that can adapt and evolve as understanding deepens.

terraform.description: MCP Server for providing seamless integration with Terraform ecosystem and interaction capabilities for Infrastructure as Code (IaC) development.

time.description: MCP server for time info and IANA timezone conversions with auto system timezone detection.
